subject: Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Matteo Trentin of Italy won Friday’s stage of the Tour de France, and the American Tejay van Garderen lost time after a crash.
snippet: Matteo Trentin of Italy won Friday’s stage of the Tour de France, and the American Tejay van Garderen lost time after a crash.
